article_text:
COPENHAGEN—Danish shipping giant A.P. Moeller Maersk agreed to sell 15 oil tankers to Belgium's Euronav NV for $980 million.

"Last year, we disclosed our intention to reduce our exposure to the VLCC (Very Large Crude Carriers) market and focus on the product segments going forward. Euronav has now presented us with a deal that supports this strategy," said Maersk Tankers Chief Executive Morten Engelstoft. The sale price was...
